* Git/GitHub



  





 Battlefield You'll Enter (You Will Learn This):

* Rule\\-based AI \\+ ML hybrids for talent risk scoring
* Labeling strategies for noisy business data



  





 WHO WE WANT

* People who see "messy data" as a personal challenge
* Builders who'd rather have a 70% accurate model in production than a 95% accurate model in a notebook
* Humans who don't need perfect datasets to start building

 We'll give you a messy dataset and 48 hours to clean it and build a basic prediction model

 THE HARD TRUTH

* Work with the messiest HR data imaginable
* Deal with constantly changing business requirements
